DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study gallium Ga 68-edotreotide ( 68Ga-DOTATOC ) positron emission tomography ( PET ) /computed tomography ( CT ) find brain tumor young patient . Diagnostic procedure , gallium Ga 68-edotreotide PET/CT imaging , may help find diagnose brain tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy 68Ga-DOTATOC Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) CT Children Young Adults With Brain Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine 68Ga-DOTATOC ( gallium Ga 68-edotreotide ) PET combine magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) differentiate embryonal tumor medulloblastoma supratentorial primitive neuroectodermal tumor ( PNET ) low high grade glioma . II . To determine 68Ga-DOTATOC PET aid identification residual tumor post operatively patient 68Ga-DOTATOC PET positive prior surgery . OUTLINE : Patients undergo gallium Ga 68-edotreotide PET/CT baseline 1-30 day surgery .
